description:
As a user of the web application,
  I want to be able to log in successfully,
  So that I can access my secure areas.

steps.name: Given  the user is on the Login page

steps.name: When  the user enters the username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
And  the user clicks the Login button
Then  the user should be redirected to the secure area
